price: All those in the heavens and earth ask of Him; every day He is engaged in some matters[8].
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ
footnotes: [8] Such as giving life and causing death, enriching some and impoverishing others, elevating some and debasing others, etc.
